    • Constructor Detail

      • Peer

        public Peer​(java.lang.String username,
            java.util.List<org.springframework.security.core.GrantedAuthority> perms,
            java.lang.String peerId,
            boolean local)
        Specify identity and permissions of a user.
        Parameters:
        username - The X.509 certificate subject DN of the user.
        perms - The roles the user has.
        peerId - The peer ID of the user.
        local - Whether the peer is local.
